_source.title: Threat Hunting Webinar - PsExec
_source.description: This dashboard can help uncover the usage of PsExec in the network from admins, red teams, and threat actors.

_source.title: Threat Hunting Webinar - DCsync DCShadow
_source.description: Dashboard to assist with hosts potentially performing DCSync or DCShadow techniques

_source.title: PsExec - Possible service creation or start
PsExec - Possible Service Creation or Start
PsExec Monitoring
_source.visState:
{"title":"PsExec Monitoring","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"![imageName](data:image/png;base64,) 
# PsExec Monitoring  
This dashboard helps uncover traits that may indicate the usage of [SysInternals PsExec](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/psexec) or the technique SMB [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029/) used by red teams and threat actors.  
Clicking the ![imageName](data:image/png;base64,) in the chart to filter out records that are related to known authorized activity.  Recommend modifying the search to exclude hosts that are known authorized sources by name and saving.  
Learn more about threat hunting for DCSync, DCShadow, and PSExec from [this webinar](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/3758948/F4E8BA721E4BB7E14B2326E762AA9031?partnerref=dashboard)"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: DCSync & DCShadow Monitoring
_source.visState:
{"title":"DCSync & DCShadow Monitoring","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"![imageName](data:image/png;base64,) 
# DCSync & DCShadow Monitoring  
This dashboard helps uncover threats to Active Directory and network authentication. The source hosts in the bar charts should only be Domain Controllers. Clicking on a bar in the chart will filter for a specific source host, and the filter can be negated to exclude hosts. Vectra recommends modifying the search to exclude domain controllers by name and saving this dashboard.  
Learn more about threat hunting for DCSync, DCShadow, and PSExec from [this webinar](https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/3758948/F4E8BA721E4BB7E14B2326E762AA9031?partnerref=dashboard)"},"aggs":[]}
